welcome_message_body: Welcome to Greater Napanee, where small-town charm meets breathtaking natural beauty. From our famous maple syrup to our charming downtown, we invite you to experience all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Collins Bay Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal for private and charter flights at Collins Bay Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kingston Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kingston Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
